name: House of Horrors (nervoussystems)
description:
You've gotten evicted from your home. Luckily, a friend of yours offers her home for you to stay in, but there's a lot more to it than meets the eye. Creatures of all types are lurking just behind the corner, and you need to figure out who you can trust before it's too late.

Good luck.

Author's note: I may or may not have worked on this for three/four months so I could publish it on Oct 31st. I hope you'll enjoy this game!!

Thank you so much for playing! More to come in the future...
